meanings.definition: To seize control of (a vehicle) by force
meanings.sent1: The villain highjacks the car in the movie.
meanings.sent2: The thief highjacks the bus and drives away.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky raccoon highjacks the garbage truck for a joyride.
meanings.sent4: His fear highjacks his ability to think clearly in stressful situations.
meanings.sent5: The hacker highjacks the computer system to steal sensitive information.

meanings.definition: To take control of (something) without permission or authorization
meanings.sent1: The bully highjacks the playground swing from the other kids.
meanings.sent2: The virus highjacks the computer and locks the user out.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat highjacks the dog's bed when it's not looking.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement highjacks her ability to focus on her homework.
meanings.sent5: The rival company highjacks their marketing strategy to gain an advantage.
